comment.author: 61671734@N00
comment._content: This area is now referred to as St John's Park, with St John's church in the centre of this image.  The church and the orphan's school buildings remain. The surrounding area is Government offices and a nursing home.

comment.author: 17008329@N00
comment._content: The Hobart Hackerspace now leases the guard house on the right. www.hobarthackerspace.com/
